# Commit Message Template
# 
# Format: <type>: <subject>
#
# Types:
#   feat:     New feature
#   fix:      Bug fix
#   update:   Improvement to existing feature  
#   remove:   Removed feature/code
#   refactor: Code restructuring (no behavior change)
#   docs:     Documentation changes
#   chore:    Maintenance (dependencies, build, etc.)
#
# Subject:
#   - Use imperative mood ("Add" not "Added")
#   - Start with capital letter
#   - No period at the end
#   - Maximum 50 characters
#
# Examples:
#   feat: Add FTP connection timeout setting
#   fix: Resolve memory leak in session manager
#   update: Improve error messages in save parser
#   remove: Delete deprecated auto-save feature
#
# This becomes your release notes! Make it user-friendly.
